attributes.action: Revise the design of motor vehicle number plates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The imposition of Draconian laws governing the size of motorcycle number plates results in the current 9" x 7" plate being so large as to spoil the appearance of many motorcycles.  This is particularly so given the yellow and black configuration, rendering UK number plates particularly cumbersome and gawdy when compared to other nations.  Vehicle number plates in the USA for example, allow the aesthetics of vehicles to be preserved whilst remaining practical for legal purposes.  Motorcycle plates there are a fraction of the present UK legal size.  

Please revise the laws to allow a new standard of vehicle number plate to be introduced.  This could usefully involve a reduction in size (e.g. 7" x 5.5" for motorcycles) and colour and would allow citizens the freedom to enjoy their vehicles without having to tolerate the current badly designed, over-sized and very dated vehicle number plates.
